comments:
Build: N20040419

Using the new progress view and other support I found the following things 
could be improved

1) the indeterminant progress bar in the status line is now too narrow on 
WinXP and looks like a flashing green block, it is also higher then it 
previously was.
2) When the dialog is open showing a running job, there is a link to get to 
the view presumable, for example while sychronizing the text in the dialog is 
selectable (like a hyperlink), HOWEVER clicking on this does not take you to 
the view
  NOTE: even after the sync was done I was never taken to the synch view
3) at some point the new progress view opened ( i clicked on the "!" on the 
bottom in the status line and the progress view opened as a fast view and 
still showed the synch job (which I think has completed now) with and empty 
progress bar.  NOTE now that the progress fast view is not properly responding 
to being resized.  The cancel button is off the right hand side, and the empty 
progress bar also goes off the right.

see attached picture

Created an attachment (id=9647)
progress too wide

- note that Clear All did not clear anything
- Remove all also did not clear anything

When opening the OLD progress view the only thing showing was the "Building 
Workspace" job which showed up as cancelled.

When starting a new job (update from the synch view) 6 Errors were reported in 
the "Error running jobs" dialog. there was an NPE in the progress 
view.. .pasted below:
